parameters.name: Schema Registry Hostname
parameters.description: Specify the hostname of the Schema Registry you want to connect to. This must be the direct hostname of the Schema Registry itself, not the Knox Endpoint.

parameters.name: CDP Workload User
parameters.description: Specify the CDP machine user or workload user name that you want to use to authenticate to Kafka. Ensure this user has the appropriate access rights to the source and destination Kafka topics.

parameters.name: Schema Name
parameters.description: Specify the schema name to be looked up in the Schema Registry.

parameters.name: CDP Workload User Password
parameters.description: Specify the password of the CDP machine user or workload user you are using to authenticate against Kafka.

parameters.name: Kafka Producer ID
parameters.description: Specify the id for the Kafka producer writing into the destination topic.

parameters.name: Filter Rule
parameters.description: Specify the SQL Filter that will be applied to the incoming Syslog data.

parameters.name: Kafka Broker Endpoint
parameters.description: Specify the Kafka bootstrap servers string as a comma separated list.
